tool.name: libraries
tool.command:
parsec libraries get_libraries
#if $library_id --library_id "$library_id" #end if #if $name --name "$name" #end if #if $deleted --deleted "$deleted" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: library_id
input.help: filter for library by library id

input.name: name
input.help: If ``name`` is set and multiple names match the given name, all the libraries matching the argument will be returned

input.name: deleted
input.help: If set to ``True``, return libraries that have been deleted

tool.help: Get all the libraries or filter for specific one(s) via the provided name or ID. Provide only one argument: ``name`` or ``library_id``, but not both.
